# worm ⇔ serpent snake

𓆑 ƒ < who < ver < wer < worm
𓆑 de < del < der reflexive pronound :

𓆑 𓈖 𓍿 𓆙 vonder <
𓆑 𓈖 𓍿 𓆙 donde >
𓆑 𓈖 𓍿 𓆙 deltu 𒌋𒌆𒌅 tul-tu √tilt ትል təl دُودَة dūda “worm” ⇔ 𓆑 de

𒌋𒌆𒌅 tul-tu √tilt ትል təl دُودَة dūda “worm”
𒌋𒌆𒌅 ⋍ •𒆪𒌅 কীট kiṭ ⋍ quod

strong PIE wanderword see KUR

𓎡 𓄿 𓂓 𓏤 𓆙 | worm | *kŕ̥miš (Gewürms wrong plural) 𐍅𐌰𐌿𐍂𐌼𐍃 “worm”s
𓎡 𓄿 𓂓 𓏤 𓆙 | worm | KAR™ qurd キキㇼ ҡорт qort kikir krimb ትል təl +++
Ⱍ Chrivi Chrivi Ч, Џ /t͡ʃ/ Črьvъ Cherv worm ⇔ shta Ⱋ;[30] צ

*kŕ̥miš “worm” krumm ⇔ curve > ʾarwe > larve
